attributes.action: propose that when all MP's are in London on parliamentary business they are accomodated in a hall of residence free of charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the current issue with regard to the MP's  second home allowance and related expenses.  We are asking the Prime Ministerto propose to parliament an investigation into the possibility of a MP's Hall of Residence in the capital.  Giving all MP's a London base from which to live in when in the capital on business.  This would replace the need for second homes in London and also ensure that MPs are working for their constituants and not for their own personal gain.  If an MP decides not to take up this offer of accomodation then they have to pay their own expenses for a London home address.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
